title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 1750.6 - Mortgage payments; requirements
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 1750.6 - Mortgage payments; requirements

State Regulations

Upon satisfactory completion of the requirements in
sections
1750.3
through
1750.5
of this Part, the housing
company shall submit to the division a list of the requirements of the
mortgagee(s) to prepay the mortgage(s), to be obtained by the housing company
from the mortgagee(s). Such list shall contain the anticipated date of
compliance with each of the mortgagee's requirements for the prepayment of the
mortgage(s), including any fees, charges or special assessments required to be
made. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9
ยง
1750.6

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
